content.description: This is the obvious diagonal ramp system that splits the cliff in two. Mostly tree-protected steep hiking/scrambling with a few exposed moments with serious consequences. The Slide is used to access the top of the cliff face and also provides access to some of the climbing on the Left Wall.
content.protection: Lots of trees to weave around if you're going to rope up.
content.location: From where the approach trail meets the Main Cliff, follow the trail left along the base to an obvious scramble upwards to a tree ledge. Follow the obvious ramp system upwards.

content.description: This is the wall left of the diagonal 4th class ramp system "The Slide"
